LanguageData.Axi_SMG_MPX_21CA.label: SIG MPX
LanguageData.Axi_SMG_MPX_21CA.description: Developed by SIG Sauer, the MPX is a 9mm submachine gun that, while visually similar to the MP5, has more in common mechanically with assault rifles then other SMGs.
